name: Jonathan Cook
content: Jonathan Cook Skip to Main Menu all assembly C/C++ cs111 cs271 cs273 cs370 cs371 cs471 cs581 Java projects swEng tools Skip to Content Toggle Sidebar How time flies! I have been here in the Computer Science department at New Mexico State University for 27 years now (2023). I completed my Ph.D at the University of Colorado in 1996, and received my B.S. ‘88 and M.S. ‘91 at Case Western Reserve University in Cleveland, Ohio. Use the tags on the left to see related posts and content! This site is generated using Hugo and is based on the Minimo theme, though there are still some layout things I don’t like. I’m learning!
